field.name: ma_nv
field.check: ma_nv not in (select ma_nv from hrnv)

field.name: so_plhd
field.check: exists (select 1 from vhrplhd b where @@table.so_plhd = b.so_plhd and (not (@@table.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and @@table.ngay_ky_plhd = b.ngay_ky_plhd)))⩓so_plhd in (select so_plhd from @@table group by so_plhd having count(*) > 1)

field.name: ma_so_hdld
field.check: not exists(select 1 from vhrcthd b where @@table.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and @@table.ma_so_hdld = b.so_hdld)

field.name: dia_chi_th_tru
field.updateValue: case when b.dia_chi_th_tru <> '' then b.dia_chi_th_tru else a.dia_chi_th_tru end

field.name: cmnd_so
field.updateValue: case when b.cmnd_so <> '' then b.cmnd_so else a.cmnd_so end

field.name: cmnd_ngay_hl
field.updateValue: case when b.cmnd_ngay_hl is not null then b.cmnd_ngay_hl else a.cmnd_ngay_hl end

field.name: cmnd_noi_cap
field.updateValue: case when b.cmnd_noi_cap <> '' then b.cmnd_noi_cap else a.cmnd_noi_cap end

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @join nvarchar(1023), @field varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0
-- Checking &Checking;
&EndErrorMode;
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' and (' + @key + ')' end
if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'hrAppendixOfLaborContract', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end
select top 0 stt_rec, so_plhd, ngay_ky_plhd, ma_so_hdld, nghe_nghiep, dia_chi_th_tru, cmnd_so, cmnd_ngay_hl, cmnd_noi_cap, so_ld, so_ngay_cap, so_noi_cap, noi_dung_td, thoi_gian_th into #r from hrplhd
select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.so_plhd, a.ngay_ky_plhd, a.ma_so_hdld, a.nghe_nghiep, a.dia_chi_th_tru, a.cmnd_so, a.cmnd_ngay_hl, a.cmnd_noi_cap, a.so_ld, a.so_ngay_cap, a.so_noi_cap, a.noi_dung_td, a.thoi_gian_th' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv where e.status = ''1''' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
if @type = '0' delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrplhd b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_ky_plhd = b.ngay_ky_plhd) select a.* into #k from #r a join hrplhd b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_ky_plhd = b.ngay_ky_plhd delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_ky_plhd = b.ngay_ky_plhd)
update #r set dia_chi_th_tru = case when a.dia_chi_th_tru <> '' then a.dia_chi_th_tru else case when b.dia_chi_th_tru <> '' then rtrim(b.dia_chi_th_tru) + case when m.ten_quan <> '' then ' - ' + rtrim(m.ten_quan) + case when n.ten_tinh <> '' then ' - ' + rtrim(n.ten_tinh) else '' end else '' end else '' end end, cmnd_so = case when a.cmnd_so <> '' then a.cmnd_so else case when b.cmnd_so <> '' then b.cmnd_so else isnull(b.ho_chieu_so, '') end end, cmnd_ngay_hl = case when a.cmnd_ngay_hl <> '' then a.cmnd_ngay_hl else cast( case when b.cmnd_so <> '' then b.cmnd_ngay_hl else case when b.ho_chieu_so <> '' then b.ho_chieu_ngay_hl else null end end as smalldatetime) end, cmnd_noi_cap = case when a.cmnd_noi_cap <> '' then a.cmnd_noi_cap else case when b.cmnd_so <> '' then isnull(p.ten_tinh, '') else case when b.ho_chieu_so <> '' then isnull(q.ten_qt, '') else '' end end end from #r a left join hrnv b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec left join hrdmtinh p on b.cmnd_noi_cap = p.ma_tinh left join hrdmtinh n on b.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh = n.ma_tinh left join hrdmquan m on b.dia_chi_th_tru_quan = m.ma_quan and b.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh = m.ma_tinh left join dmqt q on b.ho_chieu_noi_cap = q.ma_qt
-- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrplhd set @@list from hrplhd a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_ky_plhd = b.ngay_ky_plhd end
